Environmental Services

email address herephone number heresms phone number herefax number hereminicom number here

The Council undertakes routine cutting of grass in urban areas together with tree and hedge pruning and shrub and rose bed maintenance.

Grass areas which are the responsibility of the Council are cut on a enter amount rota. Continued bad weather can delay cutting and extended dry weather may make cutting unnecessary.

If you are dissatisfied with the service in an area or want further advice, please contact us using the details above.
